en_title: SJ continues to host sessions for explaining improvements to Hong Kong's electoral system (with photos)
zh_title: 律政司司長繼續主持解說會闡釋完善香港選舉制度（附圖）

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, hosted two briefing sessions today (April 9) to meet with representatives of the Law Society of Hong Kong and stakeholders in the legal sector to explain the improvements to the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region's electoral system.

Ms Cheng said that the improvements enable better implementation of the "patriots administering Hong Kong" principle, and effectively safeguard the constitutional order as set out in the Constitution and the Basic Law. Through synthesising a new democratic electoral system suited to Hong Kong's actual situation and with Hong Kong characteristics, the improved electoral system will put "one country, two systems" back on the right track, thus ensuring the prosperity and stability of Hong Kong.
At the briefing sessions, Ms Cheng also appealed to the participants to support the Government in the work of improving the electoral system.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師今日（四月九日）主持兩場解說會，與香港律師會代表及法律界持份者會面，繼續講解完善香港特別行政區選舉制度。
鄭若驊表示，這次修訂更好地落實「愛國者治港」的原則，有效維護由《憲法》和《基本法》確立的憲制秩序，構建一套符合香港實際情況、有香港特色的新的民主選舉制度，讓「一國兩制」重回正軌，繼續保持香港的繁榮和穩定。
鄭若驊亦在解說會呼籲與會者支持政府在落實完善選舉制度的工作。
